title: Having issues Patching 7.7? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Its been one hell of a crazy week in League of Legends:

1.  New Champion Teaser (WTF, 2 champions?!)
2.  God Fist Lee Sin skin looking godly
3. The community finally recognizing Marc Merrill as an actual God
4. Liquid (~~Relegated~~)

Suffice to say, this next patch will have a lot to live up to!  If you're gonna dive in early, don't let anything get in your way!  If you experience an issue, the steps below should help you out!

---------------------------------------------------------

#***Updated Client (Beta Client)***

>*** Error: "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client or try again."***

This issue rears its ugly head if something went wrong in either the updating or the installation process of the Client Update. The solution is to complete a full and clean reinstallation of League by following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to a T.

>***My IP Balance in the Store is incorrect***

There have been some issues with the client pulling correct IP balances. Some players have been able to resolve this by launching into the Legacy Client and making a single purchase to resolve this. If this does not work, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work together to resolve this.

>***I toggled the language filter off but still see words too rich for my tastes***

We've seen a few reports of the mature language filter not toggling correctly.  It's now possible to disable and enable the filter in-game by typing:  **/chatfilter** into the in-game chat.  For the more visually inclined, [check out this screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/K92fiCb.png).

>***I can't find Highlights in the client***

-  You may need to first make a highlight while watching a replay.  (Ctrl + V for starting and stopping the recording of a Highlight.)

-  Restart the client once you've saved your highlight to make the feature appear under your Profile section.  Check this [screenshot ](https://puu.sh/vaj7N/8b17d38ac9.png)to see how it looks!

-----------------------------------------------------------

#***Legacy Client***

>***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

replies.body: so whats up with the new lee skin ?

Patch ruined my client. Every time I load into a game It doesn't work. I load into the game, but I cant do anything. I can't even alt+tab or Window+ tab. I now have a horrible AFK priority because of this. Also, every time I launch the damn client it reinstalls the last patch. I get an error code sometimes like it failed to open... They don't build league clients like they use to.{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

Since your client keeps trying to download the latest patch, there's a chance that something is going wrong during the update. If the patcher misses some of the update, that could be the reason you can't do anything in games. Go over the steps in our [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can make sure you're getting the full patch downloaded.
Thank you :)
Um, I redownloaded league again, and when it was downloading in client after it hit 82%, it started going back word. Pls help

No no no I haven't played league in a while, and I redownloaded it and so the patch downloaded but after I got in the game and logged in it had to download before I could play, so I waited, and at 82% it started to go down a percent after a while. I guess nothing went wrong with the patch. (the permission guide didn't help) this is happening when lol is updating my shortcuts and says it may ask for admin permission

Since that permission guide didn't seem to help, this might be a little more detailed than I first thought. Let's get you a little more in-depth help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
thx for the help
this is when i can see my profile and friends but can't play any games
log errors !!!!
SO WHEN I CAN TRY LOG IN PBE ?
I can not enter. There is no server, only the PBE appears. Help, please

The PBE server's use their own separate client to login. If you're only seeing the PBE server, you probably need to switch to the normal League client, which should be in the default C:\Riot Games\League of Legends location.

Hi, Riot. 
I'm having trouble applying the new patch 7.7. The game always tells me that it's unable to patch due to an unknown error (Error Code is 004) and that I should restart the client. I have done that 30 times now, and it still happens. Can you tell me how to solve this issue?

Most of the time that 004 error can be traced back to something stopping your network from grabbing the new patch from our servers. Try going through the steps in this [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if you have any questions.
I'm here to help, Riot. Where's my uniform?
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/frenchmaid_nidalee_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=gMVtydKw

i think i messed up the update;

1. upon update i thought it froze up then exited the update, as i clicked exit i saw it go to 1 percent.
2. started it up again and it was ready to launch?
3. noticed my client was still the old client and that ranked was unavailable.
4. Uninstalled and reinstalled now the new client is active but ranked is still not available.

sorry if the ranked servers are just not back up yet but the whole exiting thing spooked me.
Is this still an issue?  Ranked stats may not have been visible as the servers returned from maintenance.  From what I see everything looks okay , but let me know!
yes thank you I'm not sure what really was up but everything is working fine thank you for your time.
my game is crasah how fix this
Couldn't tell you for sure without some more specifics.  What do you mean by crash?  Where is it happening?
why i cant buy new lee sin skin (god fist lee sin)

after the recent update of (low-spec machines). it resets some settings which then prevents me to enter game (i did enter but too late) so my teammates did remake, putting me to a leavebuster 20min.. it did work fine after changing the windowed mode and resolution, not sure if there's something else.

I need some more info to understand your issue.  The game itself is independent of the client, so any settings there shouldn't impact your game.  What is happening exactly, and when?  Are there error messages?  Let me know with some more info and I'll see if I can help.

When entering game, it exits and keeps saying **"You are disconnected"** and rarely a **DirectX error** comes up but I do connect into the loading screen after 7-10 min.. Already played about 5 games, thankfully no banned uptill now... sry for the late reply

Having an issue with selecting a god during load up screen cannot pick any of the free rotation gods and i keep getting banned from gameplay... which is annoying im a new player but understand how to pick a god im not an idiot so when this is happening its messing up the gameplay experience for me
why do you call them gods? you play smite?????

i need some help here whenever the launcher wants to get ingame i get an error it says: an unkown directx has occurred and league of legends cannot start. please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer. and i updated the driver and directx still dont work  btw  it was working before after this patch is dosnt i play on laptop windows  sry for my english

Typically updating those video drivers and making sure directx is updated should fix that type of error. If it doesn't, it might mean the main problem lies somewhere with your OS. We'll need to take a much closer look than I can here on the boards, so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to help there!
Patch ruined my replay. I downloaded my replays but i couldn't watch it what should i do?

It sucks that you haven't been able to watch those replays anymore, but generally your replays will only work on the patch that the game was played on. Roughly, once the client updates old replays will no longer work.
Need immediate help. The client disappeared after hitting the launch button. It didn't happen yesterday however this morning as the phase 1 introduce i cannot launch? any tip on how to fix?

When you hit the launch button, your OS needs to have the right settings in place the let the client start up properly. Our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) should be able to walk you through getting all of that set up!
hi roit i megaalawneh4  im so so so so sorry pls pls pls pls Removal  banned pls pls i soso so sorry
it is not downloading the patch it keeps having error 004

That 004 error is typically caused by something blocking your network from reaching our patching servers. Go through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can get that patch and get you back on the Rift!

This has been going on for a week or so, but every so often, I'd stay perfectly still. FPS haven't risen or lowered, And I tend to glitch through walls. Everytime I'm in a fight, I'd stand there and get  killed. Teams thought I was feeding- Pfft. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

It sounds like this might be caused by packet loss if your FPS is fine. Take your most recent game logs (the game that was screwy) and pop it into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Let me know if that confirms my packet loss suspicion!

i just joined a game at ur new gamemode but what happened ? I got in champion select and got gankplank then it said it was starting but my client got stucked at the reconnect screen and i got leaver buster please remove my leaver because its not my fault that i got it!!!! Its your client fault

We can't do much for leaverbuster's here on the boards, but I can help you get to the bottom of why you were disconnected at all. If you only get dc'd on the champion loading screen, your network is probably having a hard time getting connected to the game server specifically. Let's go through the points in this [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can narrow down what's blocking you from our game servers.

good afternoon! I have an error on my client. When I try to open the lol to refresh it appears a screen saying "Unspecified error ocurred. Please check the logs for more information." Can you help me?

That sounds like your OS might be blocking league from launching at all. You can get your permission settings in place by going through our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Hit me back up if you have any questions!
wow okay i just downloaded the whole client again *really fresh from scratch* and damn I can't open it after it installed.  So...

There may have been some files left over when you tried reinstalling from scratch that is messing with the new installation. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the reinstall option selected to make sure you don't have any leftover corrupted files laying around.
i have a problem my patch buttom is didnt work and tells me 004 error what i must do???

A 004 error is typically the patcher's way of saying your network is having a hard time talking with our patching servers. Let's go through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down what's causing your patcher to get stuck there.
